subject: p18929056
History: Recent admission for COPD exacerbation, evaluation for pneumonia.
Findings: As compared to the previous radiograph, the known right lower lobe pneumonia is minimally more extensive on todays image. There could be an associated minimal right pleural effusion. No abnormalities in the left lung. Persistent overinflation and resulting large lung volumes. Moderate cardiomegaly with tortuosity of the thoracic aorta. Unchanged left pectoral pacemaker.
